--- layout: component title: Slider description: A slider allows users to choose from a contiguous range of values. This control has a bar that shows the range and a handle that allows the user to adjust the value. In some instances it can have two sliders to represent a to and from range. guidelines: do: - Use when the user will benefit from instantaneous feedback - Use when the value or the range does not have to be precise, and an approximation is good enough. dont: - Use for date or time selection. - Use when accessibility is a concern, particularly when designing touch interfaces. - Use when the primary context of use is on a mobile device. - Use to adjust audio volume. contents: - Usage guidelines - One handle slider - Two handle slider ---
